au.rmit.ract.planning.pathplanning.ai
Interface RTPathPlanner

All Superinterfaces:
PathPlanner
All Known Implementing Classes:
ALSSLRTAStarPlanner, LSSLRTAStarPlanner
public interface RTPathPlanner
extends PathPlanner

This interface provides a common view of almost all the real-time path planning algorithms. To add an implementation of an algorithm in this library, the relevant class should implement this interface. A client application must call methods from this interface only. However, a class which implements this interface, could have its own public methods, if needed.

Author:
Abhijeet Anand (abhijeet [dot] anand [at] rmit [dot] edu [dot] au)

Method Detail

findPath

Plan findPath(SearchDomain map,
              State sNode,
              State tNode,
              int lookahead)
Find a path from a starting node to the target node within a given map. A client application should call this method whenever it needs to find a path, irrespective of the iteration number.

Parameters:
map - The SearchDomain to be searched.
sNode - Start State
tNode - Target State
lookahead - Number of steps to lookahead before returning a partially computed path in real-time
Returns:
Returns a Plan from given start State to the target Node.
